title: Client update
body: When will the client update finally arrive, I'm getting sick of having to wait up to hours for my "dodge" penalties to be over because my client crashes, or freezes in champ select. Its been on the pbe for months now and the current client is being held together by scotch tape and safety glue

replies.body:
I don't have a date when the new client will release, but we can at least work on resolving your current issues with the live client. Most of the time, freezes or crashes during champ select are caused by the client dropping connection to the matchmaking service. Incompatible network settings are the most common cause for this, so I recommend working through our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
